data.actual_result: You sign in and on the bottom it would endlessly loop between "Disconnected" and "Connecting"
data.expected_result: You sign in perfectly and normally (and I think you automatically rejoin the voice call)
data.short_description: Signing out while in a voice call and then signing back in leads to a endless "Voice Connecting" loop
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a Voice Call - Sign Out - Sign back in
